definition: Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897/Korea, esp. South Korea 大韓民國|大韩民国/surname Han
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: This year sees the tercentenary of Handel's birth.
sentences.chinese: 今年是韓德爾誕辰叄百週年。

sentences.english: The Messiah Oratorio was composed by George Frideric Handel in 1741.
sentences.chinese: 神劇由韓德爾在1741年創作而成。

sentences.english: This year sees the tercentenary of Handel's birth .
sentences.chinese: 今年是韓德爾誕辰三百週年。
